org.apache.kafka.common

Class Cluster

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.kafka.common.Cluster

  • public final class Cluster
extends java.lang.Object
    A representation of a subset of the nodes, topics, and partitions in the Kafka cluster.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors
